meanings.definition: A type of forest consisting mainly of blackwood trees.
meanings.sent1: The blackwoods were filled with tall, dark trees.
meanings.sent2: We took a hike through the blackwoods and enjoyed the peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The animals in the blackwoods must have great hiding spots!
meanings.sent4: The blackwoods whispered ancient secrets to those who dared to listen.
meanings.sent5: The blackwoods stood like silent guardians of nature.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Blackwoods greeted us warmly at the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: The Blackwoods have a long history in this town.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if the Blackwoods have a family motto.
meanings.sent4: The Blackwoods were known for their strong work ethic.
meanings.sent5: The Blackwoods' legacy continues to inspire future generations.

meanings.definition: A brand name for a line of outdoor furniture.
meanings.sent1: The new blackwoods chair is perfect for relaxing in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I bought a blackwoods table for our outdoor patio.
meanings.sent3: The blackwoods collection adds elegance to any backyard.
meanings.sent4: She felt like royalty sitting on the blackwoods bench.
meanings.sent5: The blackwoods furniture transformed the outdoor space into a cozy retreat.
